title: Auto-sync AGENTS.md to all AI tools
description: Automatically sync AGENTS.md to all AI tool-specific files via git pre-commit hook. One source of truth, auto-distributed.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create sync-agents.sh script in ralph config
Create install-hooks.sh to set up git pre-commit hook
Hook only syncs if AGENTS.md was modified
Auto-stage synced files so they're included in commit
